short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to retrieve the basic informations of a manga on MyAnimeList

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension display the japanese title, english title, synonyms, authors and chapters of the manga page you are currently browsing in "MyAnimeList.net". The informations are displayed like this:

- jap_title (eng_title) (By auth) [ch]
